title: Moloch
summary: Moloch (/ˈmoʊlɒk/; Masoretic: מֹלֶךְ‎, mōleḵ; Ancient Greek: Μόλοχ, Latin: Moloch; also Molech or Molek) is a name or a term which appears in the Hebrew Bible several times, primarily in the book of Leviticus. The Bible strongly condemns practices which are associated with Moloch, practices which appear to have included child sacrifice.[1]
